com.brinybeach.tinywebserver

Class HttpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brinybeach.tinywebserver.HttpRequest

  • public class HttpRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrap the parsed request attributes received from the Web client. HttpRequests are created by the HttpRequestParser. HttpRequests are constant; their values cannot be changed after they are created. Because HttpRequest objects are immutable they can be shared. author: bryantbunderson

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Create the HttpRequest from individual parsed attributes.
